item.title: Definite integrals involving Bessel functions expressed as a series of special functions
item.description: arXiv:2502.14876v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Series involving hypergeometric functions are used to derive, extend and evaluate integrals involving the product of two Bessel functions of the first kind $J_{u}(a z)$ $J_{v}(b z)$ with order $u,v$, studied by Landau et al. The method used in this work is contour integration.
item.dc:creator: Robert Reynolds
